about_the_game:
Take the position of a representative of an ancient civilization. Become a farmer, who is only making his baby steps but is hungry for greatness. The mission is remarkably ambitious: feed hordes of people, weasel your way into the ruler's good graces, and change the bags of flour into gold-filled ones.

In front of you are vast acres of space, left for you to manage: wild, thickly wooded lands that need copious amounts of work and time before a single edible plant appears. You begin with grubbing up. At your disposal are a hatchet and a machete, as well as cattle, which can help you with knocking down the biggest of trees. The obtained resources will be used to construct farm buildings.

Your fate, success or failure, lies largely in your livestock. Take care of your animals, feed them, and water them, and they will repay you with hard work at every step of your journey. Make no mistake, Ancient Farm there is plenty to do. Besides already mentioned grubbing up and cultivating the land for farming, you will have to plow fields, sow seeds, collect the harvest, process grain into flour, dig ditches that lead water to fields, and relentlessly take care of farming infrastructure.

And it’s still a little taste of what the game has to offer. Build your reputation step by step, work hard and the harvest will be fruitful. Take ancient farming into the future with Ancient Farm.
detailed_description:
Take the position of a representative of an ancient civilization. Become a farmer, who is only making his baby steps but is hungry for greatness. The mission is remarkably ambitious: feed hordes of people, weasel your way into the ruler's good graces, and change the bags of flour into gold-filled ones.

In front of you are vast acres of space, left for you to manage: wild, thickly wooded lands that need copious amounts of work and time before a single edible plant appears. You begin with grubbing up. At your disposal are a hatchet and a machete, as well as cattle, which can help you with knocking down the biggest of trees. The obtained resources will be used to construct farm buildings.

Your fate, success or failure, lies largely in your livestock. Take care of your animals, feed them, and water them, and they will repay you with hard work at every step of your journey. Make no mistake, Ancient Farm there is plenty to do. Besides already mentioned grubbing up and cultivating the land for farming, you will have to plow fields, sow seeds, collect the harvest, process grain into flour, dig ditches that lead water to fields, and relentlessly take care of farming infrastructure.

And it’s still a little taste of what the game has to offer. Build your reputation step by step, work hard and the harvest will be fruitful. Take ancient farming into the future with Ancient Farm.
name: Ancient Farm

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 or AMD FX-8320 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon R7 265 or better (min 2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5675C or AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or Radeon RX 570 or better (min 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Plow, sow, and reap. Sounds familiar? Not this time. Ancient Farm may not be the first farming simulator but it’s the first one to take you back thousands of years into the past, to ancient times where technology wasn’t nearly as impressive as it is today, but humanity was just as hungry as always.
supported_languages:
English*, Polish
*languages with full audio support
